description:
Form-fitting jeans with legging-like comfort. With the look of classic denim DU/ER’s performance denim brings a little freedom to skinny jeans.

  • Made from organic cotton blended with EcoMade Coolmax® polyester and LYCRA® EcoMade spandex
  • EcoMade Coolmax fibres are made from recycled materials, giving new life to single use PET bottles and upcycled textiles
  • Fabric helps wick moisture away and has good stretch
  • Flat-stitched side seams hug the body and lay comfortably against your skin
  • Contoured waistband flows with your natural curves
  • Mid-rise with a slim fit though the hips and thighs, then straight all the way down to the cuff
  • Invisible gusset for comfort
name: DU/ER Performance Denim Skinny - Women's
